title: Virtuous circle: Work from Ansys on plastics recycling - Develop3D
summary: Ansys, a simulation software developer, collaborated with recycling companies and an automotive parts producer to develop a process for using recycled plastics in products. This process uses simulation software to optimize the design of products made with recycled plastics, ensuring their strength and performance meet the requirements of the original equipment manufacturers. The project successfully demonstrates the potential of recycled plastics to be a viable alternative to virgin polymers, contributing to both sustainability and cost savings.
product_or_process: Plastic Recycling in Stochastic Modelling (PRISM) Project

title: Plastic recycling is failing â€“ here's how the world must respond - The Conversation
summary: The article argues that relying solely on recycling to address plastic waste is ineffective and unsustainable. It proposes a multi-pronged approach that emphasizes reducing plastic production, promoting reuse, and substituting plastic with alternatives. It also highlights the need for responsible recycling practices, including banning toxic additives and addressing the social and environmental concerns of waste exports.

title: Restaurants In Unincorporated LA County Are Now Banned From Using Plastics. What To Know About The New ... - LAist
summary: Los Angeles County has implemented a new plastics ordinance that prohibits the use of single-use plastic foodware and Styrofoam in unincorporated areas. The ordinance aims to reduce plastic waste, which is a major contributor to litter, pollution, and climate change. The ordinance phases out these materials over the next two years and includes financial penalties for violations.

title: Victoria's Secret isn't keeping its 'Forever Bra' a secret - The Cool Down
summary: Victoria's Secret is introducing the Forever Bra, a new product designed with sustainability in mind. The bra's pads are made from recyclable plant-based materials, allowing them to be recycled into new bras. The company also plans to recycle the non-recyclable components of the bra, such as metal and plastic clasps, by converting them into electricity at waste-to-energy plants.

title: 12 Social Enterprise Business Ideas and Business Models - Causeartist
summary: Social enterprises are innovative businesses that prioritize social and environmental impact alongside financial returns. These ventures address various challenges, such as poverty, inequality, and climate change, by leveraging market-based strategies to generate both profit and positive change. Social enterprise business ideas span diverse sectors, from eco-friendly product manufacturing to community-supported agriculture, showcasing the potential of businesses to contribute to a more sustainable and equitable world.
